sentences.sContent: The project seems to obsess him.
sentences.sCn: 这项工程似乎令他着迷。

synos.tran: 迷住，缠住；使…着迷；使…困扰

words.tran: 强迫性的；着迷的；分神的
过分地；着迷地，着魔似地
痴迷；困扰；[内科][心理] 强迫观念

remMethod.val: ob + sess(=sit坐) → 坐着不走 → (使)困扰， (使)着迷

trans.tranOther: if something or someone obsesses you, you think or worry about them all the time and you cannot think about anything else – used to show disapproval
